title: Stained
description: Held captive since birth, Maddox never knew normal.As a child, he took comfort in reading. It was his escape; his only glimpse at what life and love could be outside the walls that he had been hidden behind.When he is finally freed, the world he enters is something he never could have imagined. Then he meets Harper Abraham, and his heart’s very beat … changes. But, can he?
author: M.J. Fields
